message.content:
Step 1: Find the difference in ages between you and your sister when you were 6 years old. Your sister was half your age at that time, so she was (6 / 2) = 3 years old.
Step 2: Calculate how many years have passed since then. You are now 80 years old, so the number of years that have passed is 80 - 6 = 74 years.
Step 3: Add the number of years that have passed to your sister's age when you were 6. Your sister was 3 years old at that time, so now she is (3 + 74) = 77 years old.
